sources.title: Somewhere in Civvies
sources.description: Title: Somewhere in Civvies Summary: Directed by: Maclean Rogers Actors: Frank Randle, George Doonan, Suzette Tarri Production Company: Butcher's Film Service Release Date: 15 November 1943 (UK) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Add Full Plot

metadata.Plot: This is in the credits so we know whom to blame for this unfunny mess.It looks as if he must have used material from half a dozen music hall sketches.Also features radio comedienne Suzette Taari.
metadata.Actors: Frank Randle, George Doonan, Suzette Tarri
